N1.label: US Expansion Accelerates
N1.description: Pro Medicus executes on growth strategy; earnings accelerate
N1.plain_english: This is the bull case — Pro Medicus delivers on its key initiatives and the market rewards it.
N1.what_to_watch: Next earnings result and forward guidance.
N1.upside: Material re-rating if execution surprises to the upside.
N1.risk_plain: If growth disappoints, this narrative weakens.

N2.label: Valuation Mean-Reversion
N2.description: Pro Medicus delivers steady-state results; valuation holds
N2.plain_english: The company continues on its current trajectory — neither surprising positively nor negatively.
N2.risk_plain: If the base case is already priced in, limited upside from here.

N3.label: Competitive Disruption
N3.description: Pro Medicus faces headwinds; earnings or multiples compress
N3.plain_english: This is the bear case — something goes wrong and the stock de-rates.
N3.what_to_watch: Cost pressures, competitive threats, or macro headwinds.
N3.risk_plain: Material downside if multiple risks crystallise simultaneously.

N4.label: AI Amplifies the Moat
N4.description: A structural shift changes the investment case for Pro Medicus
N4.plain_english: An external force — technology, regulation, or competition — fundamentally alters the business.
N4.what_to_watch: Industry disruption signals and regulatory changes.
N4.risk_plain: If disruption materialises, prior assumptions become invalid.

big_picture: Pro Medicus (ASX: PME) — coverage initiated. Full analysis pending.
